title: Flying Coach With Steve Kerr & Pete Carroll: Two Champions on Mentors, Philosophies, and Why They Coach (Premiere Episode!)
description:
Golden State Warriors head coach Steve Kerr and Seattle Seahawks head coach Pete Carroll sit down for the premiere episode of their new podcast ‘Flying Coach With Steve Kerr & Pete Carroll,’ in which they offer up their unique perspectives as championship-level coaches in the NBA and NFL.
Hosts: Steve Kerr and Pete Carroll
This show is raising money for COVID-19 relief. You can help! Donate here!

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
